name: FARO (55 HP Games)
description:
Remember, in this game is not importat to succed in every single level:  instead try to learn how to improve your skills so that you can reach your true goals.

Thanks you player  for being here,  good luck ...and may the force of the Itten Prism be with you!

::::::::::::CONTROLS::::::::::::

  • [ Arrow Keys ] to move left or right;
  • [ Space bar ] during the game to Jump;
  • [ Space bar ] during the intro to skip it;
  • [Q or E key] play level 3 to know ;D ;
  • [W key] like above with level 10 :B  .
